Hmm hmm hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":102114,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむ、これは珍しい客人だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, this is a rare visitor.\""},{"lineNumber":102115,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス殿も加わりますかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shall we have Lord Rance join us as well?\""},{"lineNumber":102116,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわわわ、爺の集会だーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, it’s a gathering of old men!\""},{"lineNumber":102117,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな驚くことなかろう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's no need to be so surprised...\""},{"lineNumber":102118,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっほっほっ、集会というよりは茶会ですがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hohoho, rather than a meeting, it's more like a tea party.\""},{"lineNumber":102119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんだ、お前ら友達なのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hey, you guys are friends?\""},{"lineNumber":102120,"originalJapaneseLine":"「茶飲み友達という奴ですな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We are what you might call tea-drinking friends.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「偉い人の座る椅子にたまたま座った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just happened to sit in the chair where the important person sits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうろく寸前爺ってだけじゃないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't he just an old geezer on the verge of senility?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バレス将軍はとても立派な方で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General Baresu is a very admirable person...
He truly is an amazing individual..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むむむ、あのアールコートちゃんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmmm, that Arlcoat-chan is sticking to me this much...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺にこれほど食い下がる程とは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To the point of pushing back against me so thoroughly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦術、戦略を熟知し、行動力も人望もある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He has deep knowledge of tactics and strategy, along with both decisiveness and popularity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これといった弱点のない方です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no particular weakness to speak of."
"...You all, come here for a moment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無惨、バレスの手の中で生卵が粉々に割れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pitifully, the raw egg shattered into pieces in Baresu's hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは！　ばーーーーか！」
「あの……ランス殿？　これはいったい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... Lord Rance? What exactly is this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前には分からん深ーい理由があるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is a deep reason you wouldn't understand.
"I-I see... well, if that's the case..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく分かりませんがそういうことなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't quite understand, but if that's how it is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほれ、大したことなさそうだろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "See? It doesn't seem like a big deal, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな人を尊敬していることね……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that he respects a person like this...)"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か失礼なこと考えてないか？」
「ん？　なんだ、この部屋。賑やかだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? What's this? This room is lively."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下着ファッションショーでもしてるのかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: having some kind of underwear fashion show?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺様も混ぜろーー！」
「ランス殿も加わりますかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shall we have Lord Rance join us as well?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわわわ、爺の集会だーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, it’s a gathering of old men!"
"There's no need to be so surprised..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっほっほっ、集会というよりは茶会ですがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hohoho, rather than a meeting, it's more like a tea party."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「茶飲み友達という奴ですな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We are what you might call tea-drinking friends."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「偉い人の座る椅子にたまたま座った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I just happened to sit in the chair where the important person sits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうろく寸前爺ってだけじゃないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't he just an old geezer on the verge of senility?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バレス将軍はとても立派な方で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General Baresu is a very admirable person...
He truly is an amazing individual..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むむむ、あのアールコートちゃんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmmmm, that Arlcoat-chan is sticking to me this much...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺にこれほど食い下がる程とは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To the point of pushing back against me so thoroughly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦術、戦略を熟知し、行動力も人望もある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He has deep knowledge of tactics and strategy, along with both decisiveness and popularity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これといった弱点のない方です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no particular weakness to speak of."
"...You all, come here for a moment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無惨、バレスの手の中で生卵が粉々に割れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pitifully, the raw egg shattered into pieces in Baresu's hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは！　ばーーーーか！」
「あの……ランス殿？　これはいったい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... Lord Rance? What exactly is this...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前には分からん深ーい理由があるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There is a deep reason you wouldn't understand.
"I-I see... well, if that's the case..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よく分かりませんがそういうことなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't quite understand, but if that's how it is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほれ、大したことなさそうだろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "See? It doesn't seem like a big deal, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな人を尊敬していることね……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that he respects a person like this...)"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か失礼なこと考えてないか？」
「ん？　なんだ、この部屋。賑やかだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? What's this? This room is lively."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下着ファッションショーでもしてるのかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: having some kind of underwear fashion show?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺様も混ぜろーー！」
「ランス殿も加わりますかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shall we have Lord Rance join us as well?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわわわ、爺の集会だーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, it’s a gathering of old men!"
"There's no need to be so surprised..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっほっほっ、集会というよりは茶会ですがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hohoho, rather than a meeting, it's more like a tea party."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「茶飲み友達という奴ですな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We are what you might call tea-drinking friends."
